messages: 59c64dc200d402daa7e89409bdac732d (14:18): Is there a way I can copy the local coordinates from a face to an object?
59c64dc200d402daa7e89409bdac732d (14:18): eg. I can select the face and hit * on keypad, to set view to have local coords of face
59c64dc200d402daa7e89409bdac732d (14:19): but can I copy the local coords from there to an object?
59c64dc200d402daa7e89409bdac732d (14:19): local axi I mean
59c64dc200d402daa7e89409bdac732d (14:23): No one knows ?
b7cfbed8c323ab16f7c780635cafa9c6 (14:46): Is there button to Redo?

5b8a284fa662b200c0d6b94314f7fc48 (14:52): Goo'day folks

b7cfbed8c323ab16f7c780635cafa9c6 (15:43): Is there possibility to do 1 vertex "face" ?
f82ea6d4f6104f9ca2ca5252f40f8a0e (15:46): Exitialis, what's the point?
a0d94a0d53b7853684fe24868bf1e5f2 (15:46): Exitialis: I am definitely not a blender expert, so maybe I am wrong, but I think that there have to be at least 3 vertexes
4e034d79f6fd38d71ee4b49748485a3e (15:46): one face is 3 or 4 vertex
4e034d79f6fd38d71ee4b49748485a3e (15:47): 3 vertex yes, a quad is 2 faces of 3 vertex
b7cfbed8c323ab16f7c780635cafa9c6 (16:02): How do i make polygon to appear like it glows.
a0d94a0d53b7853684fe24868bf1e5f2 (16:05): what do You mean Exitialis ? You want polygon to produce a light  ?
b7cfbed8c323ab16f7c780635cafa9c6 (16:06): dr_Fell or.. just to look like it does...
b7cfbed8c323ab16f7c780635cafa9c6 (16:06): Kinda
b7cfbed8c323ab16f7c780635cafa9c6 (16:06): giving it "glow" around it
59638e7065b402c7d834d5ee73fbb594 (16:07): well the "Emit" setting in the material settings makes it produce light, but it doesn't look like it's glowing much, it will just look lighter
59638e7065b402c7d834d5ee73fbb594 (16:07): you probably want that sort of blurred lightsaber-ish thing? :D
b7cfbed8c323ab16f7c780635cafa9c6 (16:07): ... yeah.. thats kinda what i am looking for

a0d94a0d53b7853684fe24868bf1e5f2 (16:10): Exitialis: I don't know if there are other ways to make "light saber effect" (the answer is probably yes) but what I have found on google after quick search is
a0d94a0d53b7853684fe24868bf1e5f2 (16:10): http://www.blender.org/cms/Newsitem.620+M5027dcb6973.0.html Light Saber plugin

4e034d79f6fd38d71ee4b49748485a3e (16:12): Halo Material

a0d94a0d53b7853684fe24868bf1e5f2 (16:18): halo material looks like a good idea
